content.text: Julie is the friend of Jim Halpert and Pam Beesly. She is forced to endure a horrible date with Michael Scott. She is played by Laurie Okin.

She is introduced as Jim and Pam's friend, but can't be too close as she wasn't at the wedding. Pam sets her up with Michael. She laughs at everything he says, until he turns into his date character, "Date Mike," and things turn for the worse. She leaves after he talks to another girl, Donna.
